name: graphrag (microsoft)
description: [项目级] A modular graph-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system。来源: https://github.com/microsoft/graphrag

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: The GraphRAG project is a data pipeline and transformation suite that is designed to extract meaningful, structured data from unstructured text using the power of LLMs. To learn more about GraphRAG and how it can be used to enhance your LLM's ability to reason about your private data, please visit the Microsoft Research Blog Post.
